newsitem.title: THAILAND: Trading in One Holding to resume.
newsitem.headline: Trading in One Holding to resume.

text.p: The Thai bourse said it has decided to allow trading in troubled One Holding Plc to resume from Monday.

The Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET) said it lifted the suspension in trading of One Holding's shares after the company disclosed information about its default on loan payments and details of its existing borrowings.
The SET suspended trading in One Holding's shares on March 19 on the company's request.
One Holding earlier this month said it had defaulted on bills of exchange worth a total of $13.5 million baht and owed a further 7.018 billion baht ($270 million) in bonds and loans.
